thread.title: Ethertronics Introduces Prestta P822601 Embedded Antenna
thread.title_full: Ethertronics Introduces Prestta P822601 Embedded Antenna

title: Ethertronics Introduces Prestta P822601 Embedded Antenna
text:
Ethertronics Introduces Prestta P822601 Embedded Antenna Ethertronics Introduces Prestta P822601 Embedded Antenna August 31 2015 GO TO SUPPLIER'S WEBSITE 
August 31, 2015 – Ethertronics announced Prestta P822601 LTE/Cellular Octa-Band Embedded (Surface Mount) Antenna that’s capable of providing a robust radio link and minimal interference across all major bands – 700, 750, 850, 900, 1800, 1900, 2100 and 2700 MHz. 
The octa-band antenna is suitable for a wide range of M2M and IoT applications, including automotive, automatic meter reading, tracking and many more. Isolated Magnetic Dipole (IMD) technology enables high performance and isolation characteristics. 
Optimized for MIMO configuration, this antenna meets an important LTE requirement. Thisocta-band antenna additionally supports fallback for 2G and 3G networks, providing ubiquitous coverage for Internet of Things (IoT) applications. IMD antenna technology additionally provides superior RF field containment, resulting in less interaction with surrounding components, lower program development risk and yielding a quicker time-to-market. 
Utilizing a cost-competitive PCB antenna design, this antenna is easy to surface mount on a device’s board. The easy-to-integrate antenna’s small profile and low-height consumes less board space than other antennas.
